entries.arrived_at_loc: pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < pcontrast1 Designated rendezvous point reached. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Hostile craft detected on attack vector. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased. pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: You have failed the duty because the transport was destroyed.
entries.failed_protect: You have failed to protect the transport.
entries.found_loc: pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < pcontrast1 Rendezvous point locked in. pcontrast3 >
entries.goodbye_1: We are making our final approach now.
entries.goodbye_2: This is where we get off, thanks Captain.
entries.quest_escort_d: Imperial Transport carrying goods and supplies for the Station.
entries.quest_location_d: The Transports will be making their jump a ways out from the station, travel to them and escort them back.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel here to meet with the transport.
entries.reason_1: Lets get a move on Captain, danger surrounds us.
entries.reason_2: Be careful, the enemy is watching.
entries.reason_3: Rebels were shadowing us earlier, so I expect an attack anytime.
entries.taunt_2: This craft will not make its destination.
entries.title: Endor System: Duty: Escort Imperial Transports
entries.title_d: Imperial Transports are flying goods and supplies into the Research Station.  Meet them at their arrival point and escort them safely to the base.
